data.eml:eml: Two new species of Scirtothrips genus-group (Thripidae) of Northern Peninsular Malaysia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Y. F. Ng, L. A. Mound (2016): Two new species of Scirtothrips genus-group (Thripidae) of Northern Peninsular Malaysia. Zootaxa 4088 (1): 141-145, DOI: 10.11646/zootaxa.4088.1.8
